Bash(git -C "C:\Dev\gpnet3" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(security): hide invite tokens in production responses

Tokens and invite URLs were being returned in API responses regardless
of environment, which could expose sensitive registration tokens in
production. Now these fields are only included when NODE_ENV is not
"production", allowing development testing while keeping production
secure.

Affected endpoints:
- POST /api/admin/invites (createUserInvite)
- POST /api/admin/invites/:id/resend (resendUserInvite)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Dev\gpnet3" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(security): implement multi-tenant isolation with organizationId

Completed Phases 1-7 of security hardening implementation to prevent
cross-organization data access vulnerabilities.

**Phase 1-2: Schema & Migration**
- Added organizationId to User and WorkerCase interfaces
- Created migration 0009 for remaining tables (case_actions, email_drafts,
  notifications, termination_processes, case_discussion_notes, case_attachments)
- Updated shared/schema.ts with organizationId columns

**Phase 3: Auth Middleware**
- Updated JWT tokens to include organizationId
- Maintained backwards compatibility with companyId
- Updated auth middleware to use organizationId

**Phase 4: Case Ownership Middleware**
- Created requireCaseOwnership() middleware
- Implements admin bypass pattern
- Returns 404 (not 403) to prevent information disclosure
- Logs access denials to audit_events

**Phase 5: Storage Layer**
- Updated 17+ storage methods with organizationId filtering
- Created getGPNet2CaseByIdAdmin() for admin access
- Added case ownership verification pattern
- Updated action, notification, and email draft queries

**Phase 6: Audit Logger**
- Created comprehensive audit logging service
- Non-blocking audit events (never throws)
- Tracks login, case access, AI operations, access denials

**Phase 7: Route Authorization**
- Applied authorize() + requireCaseOwnership() to all case routes
- Updated routes: routes.ts, actions.ts, notifications.ts, emailDrafts.ts, smartSummary.ts
- Added organizationId filtering throughout service layer
- Integrated audit logging for security events

**Security Improvements:**
- Users can only access cases within their organization
- Admins can access all organizations (cross-tenant)
- All case endpoints verify ownership before access
- Access denials logged for forensics
- Information disclosure prevented (404 vs 403)

**Files Modified:** 20+ files
**Lines Changed:** ~1,200 lines
**Migration:** 0009 ready to run

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
